attributes.action: Make Suzy the new Star of the Cadbury's Flake Advert and not Joss Stone
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Please sign this petition if you think Suzy Bennett from Plymouth should Star in the new Cadbury's Flake Advert, and get rid or Joss Stone because Suzy has a better Janner accent and could do a better Job!

reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
Intended to be humorous, or has no point about government policy
